name: Ketchup Clicker 2.0 (Pre-Alpha V0.09)
description:
Ketchup Clicker is Back!

Pre-Alpha V0.09!

Changelog!

V0.01: Basic Game, 1 button

V0.02: Added Three Upgrades

V0.03: Added Ketchup per click feature, fixed the ketchup textbox and changed some upgrade text

V0.04: Added Some Ketchup Per Second Buttons/Upgrades

V0.05: Added Ketchup Graphic

V0.06: Changed to a better font, added button graphics

V0.07: Updated some graphics and added in a background!

V0.08: Added a lot more upgrades.

V0.09: Added even more upgrades!
